response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. Given its worth of $1,200,000 to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product and to ensure that you can secure it without compromising on your financial planning. Should you decide to accept this offer, you will be making a wise investment that promises to deliver exceptional returns and satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1100000}
